Articles.Content:
Any of you remember this thread?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/1172-Challenge-The-Glory-of-the-Brick

I kinda want the brick from it, but the download link for it is dead.

Any help with this?

what would you want a useless gray block for? in any case, if you want to carry useless weight, or it has to do with creating a challenge, then you can use the weights mod that adds inline weights parts.

Having it be a 10m cube has the added challenge of it being cumbersome; and with FAR having really undesireable drag characteristics; instead of just being a challenge to see who can get a big thing into space
I could try and give it a shot. It'll probAbly take ages, and if I do get round to it, it won't be A priority.
Couldn't you just take the stock cubic probe core, scale it waaaay up, and increase the weight?
That wouldn't work, it'd have the properties of the Probe Core.

That wouldn't work, it'd have the properties of the Probe Core.
Use a default/blank part cfg and just use the core model. You can even swap the texture out for something simple if you wanted quite easily.
